metadata.title: CVE-2019-10103 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA projects created using the Kotlin (JS Client/JVM Server) IDE Template were resolving Gradle artifacts using an http connection, potentially allowing an MITM attack. This issue, which was fixed in Kotlin plugin version 1.3.30, is similar to CVE-2019-10101.

criterions.comment: intellij-community-idea package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
